to play the game properly with full screen and all you need to follow the next steps 1 select the third option workaround win 8 2 in the game click lmb to skip all the cutscenes you will be able to replay all of them shortly 3 enter the settings and then at the display options tab choose default settings 4 hit done and click exit to close the game 5 select to run the game in the first option this time thank me later

fallout tactics is a spinoff of the fallout roleplaying series focusing more on the combat than any other aspect of classic fallout while this certainly creates a different game it is still a very good game fallout tactics is very linear but still provides lots of interesting locations to explore with your squad i would highly recommend this game but i would say do not go into it looking for the same experience as fallout 1 or 2 the roleplaying takes a back seat to the combat here
actually really fun other than steam selling games that need an hour of research to actually launch i dont have any complaints if you dont mind clunky controls you will probably really enjoy this
only get this if you really love fallout and really love old fallout combat mechanics if you dont then you will despise this game like i did but its clearly a good game
